text: This game sold me on getting a WiiU. Soooo worth it.
author: daneofurexistence

text: This song is great on its own, but it is also probably the track most enhanced by the environment.  Every time I near the end of the course, I get so excited to hear those shy guys on their minecarts plinking away.  One of the highlights of the game.
author: Xarnax42

text: I can never listen to this song without hearing Ass Guy Falls ever again.
author: 21stCenturyBoy

text: Strings and wind instruments with a rhythmic beat. Always love that combination.
author: Jonochrome

text: We're entering the Top 3! For a while this was my #1 because I think it's a near perfect Mario Kart game, but I decided to put two games ahead that stayed with me more as I reflected on my gaming year. There's not much else to say about this game since I already gave my thoughts in the recent #1700 video, but this is still my game of choice when I invite friends over. Always good times.
author: SupraDarky

text: Didn't like the misleading advertising about the anti-gravity. In reality it changed nothing.
